fr.utbm.lo43.model

Class TurnManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.utbm.lo43.model.TurnManager

  • public class TurnManager
extends java.lang.Object
    TurnManager is the class that manage all the essential method of the game, the turn handling and updating the game state
    Author:
    Francesco, Th√©au, Quentin, Malek

                                                             boolean toLeft,
                                                             boolean toRight)
        Method used to get the cost of each resource type
        Parameters:
        p - The player that wants to trade
        toLeft - true if the player trade with his left neighbor
        toRight - true if the player trade with his right neighbor
        Returns:
        A list containing the cost for each type in the following order : primitivePrice, manufacturedPrice
